title.narrative: EQUITY BASED PLANNING & MONITORING

description.narrative: By 2018, MoEAC has enhanced capacity at all levels to better plan, monitor and evaluate education programme and policies., which contributes to Early Learning, Education â€“ General, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Learning Outcomes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By the end of 2018, appropriate legislation, policies, strategic plans and budgets set up and implemented for improved teaching and learning outcomes for boys and girls (pre-primary, primary, secondary).

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2018, MoEAC has enhanced capacity at all levels to better plan, monitor and evaluate education programme and policies.

description.narrative: UNICEF continued supporting the management of strategic information by streamlining Management Information System to support disaggregated data collection, verification, dissemination and uptake. Ministries of Education and Gender actively using evidence base to enhance sectoral budgeting, planning and management at central and decentralised levels. | Status:Met | As-of Date:18/12/2018
